entry.tran: 缅甸的；缅甸人的；缅甸语的；缅甸文化的
entry.def: Burmese means belonging or relating to Burma, or to its people, language, or culture. Burma is now known as Myanmar.
A Burmese is a Burmese citizen or a person of Burmese origin.
Burmese is the main language spoken by the people who live in Burma, now known as Myanmar.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Myanmar
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Myanmar or its people;
